column5: Hi folks, Just asking any of the guys/ladies on the board here if they can recommend an instructor for a one stop PAL and hunter education course, in the Peterborough or surrounding communities. I have been on the OHEP website and there are a number of instructors. My Dad and I are looking to take the course this winter. I have spent a lot of time in a classroom in my life and I just don't want it to be a bore. We are there to learn of course and will take it seriously but if possible we would like to enjoy it, since it will be a minimum 20 hour course. Maybe sinker or some local guys on here know of someone. Thanks
Had a great course in Barrie with some guys from the Barrie gun Club.
Look up guide to game.....cant remember his name at the moment, but hes in millbrook/fraserville area. Great guy, and runs the course from his home.  S.
thanks guys I will look those up .

Hi folks, Just asking any of the guys/ladies on the board here if they can recommend an instructor for a one stop PAL and hunter education course, in the Peterborough or surrounding communities. I have been on the OHEP website and there are a number of instructors. My Dad and I are looking to take the course this winter. I have spent a lot of time in a classroom in my life and I just don't want it to be a bore. We are there to learn of course and will take it seriously but if possible we would like to enjoy it, since it will be a minimum 20 hour course. Maybe sinker or some local guys on here know of someone. Thanks i know you can do it online but while you're in class ask about doing your turkey license at the same time.
Does the name Ed Hunter ring a bell?
Mark Yourkevich 705 768 6550  Give him a call. He's local to PTBO, just outside millbrook between cty rd 10 and 28 off syer line.  S.
Np. Good luck. When you get your license, and want to try waterfowling, get in touch. Im kinda crazy about ducks lol  S.
randy jennings does the course as well, works for the ofah lives just outside lindsay
